ThingDef.label: fake door
ThingDef.description: A non-functional door. It's just two painted plywood panels and won't open. Can be traversed.

ThingDef.label: fake flap door
ThingDef.description: A non-functional flap door. It's just two painted cloth sheets. Can be traversed.

ThingDef.label: fake autodoor
ThingDef.description: A non-functional autodoor. It's just two painted metal sheets. Can be traversed.

ThingDef.label: fake fence door
ThingDef.description: A non-functional fence door. It's just two painted plywood panels and won't open. Can be traversed.

ThingDef.label: fake column
ThingDef.description: A fake, painted plywood column that won't hold any ceiling.

ThingDef.label: bookshelf
ThingDef.description: A bookshelf containing a variety of unreadable tomes and publications.

ThingDef.label: cupboard with plates
ThingDef.description: A large cupboard with some plates.

ThingDef.label: warehouse shelf with boxes
ThingDef.description: An impassable warehouse shelf with boxes.

ThingDef.label: fake sarcophagus
ThingDef.description: A fake sarcophagus with nothing inside. Sealed shut.

ThingDef.label: fake grave
ThingDef.description: A fake grave with nothing buried beneath it.

ThingDef.label: plant pot
ThingDef.description: A fake plant pot. Colonists will not plant anything here, so you can put a fake flower on top.

ThingDef.label: plasteel ATM
ThingDef.description: A non-functional plasteel money dispensing machine.

ThingDef.label: silver ATM
ThingDef.description: A non-functional silver money dispensing machine.

ThingDef.label: wooden ATM
ThingDef.description: A non-functional wooden money dispensing machine.

ThingDef.description: A bookshelf containing a variety of unreadable tomes and publications.
